RT @SriSri: By complaining against me, the Congress have done to themselves what it did not want me to do to them.
Why to vote ?Voting can actually give you the credibility to make your concerns a top priority for legislators.
Why to vote ? Voting is our chance to make a difference in our own lives and within the world.

Vote to effect change!
It was through elections that we voted in officials who were champions for civil rights.
By voting we make our concerns about schools, safety, housing, and other issues heard. When we vote, we are looking out for our kids voices
Why to vote ?Our children are depending on us to represent their voices too! Because our children can’t vote. Don't miss a vote
When we vote, we are actually telling elected officials and lawmakers how we feel about education, public safety, social security, etc
Why to http://t.co/2KMmR9bbzx is the way to speak your mind and let your voice be heard! Your vote is your voice.
